specification.title: Google Technical Support Lead Generation Implementation

required_attendees: Website admin with FTP/admin panel access to source code
CRM Point of Contact with admin access
Google Ads manager with account access
pre_call_checklist: Accept calendar invite (authorizes Technical Specialist to make changes)
Install Google Meet for screen sharing
content.authorization_method: Calendar invite acceptance required before account changes
content.implementation_scope: Installation of tracking codes on website, campaign, and analytics account
